title: More in labor force, harder to fight unemployment

content.question: An increase in the labor force participation rate will

choices.label: make it easier to reduce unemployment
make it more difficult to reduce unemployment

content.answer: make it more difficult to reduce unemployment

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
